Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3816 affecting package openwsman for versions less than 2.6.8-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-3816 affecting package openwsman for versions less than 2.6.8-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openwsman is earlier than 2.6.8-13, affected by CVE-2019-3816
